languages.text: Авгуры корабля фиксируют развернутую среди джунглей базу эксплораторов. Вернувшиеся с разведки блюстители докладывают, что лагерь абсолютно пуст, а единственный обнаруженный ими техножрец найден мертвым на краю странного вида пропасти, разорвавшей планету. Судя по оставленным в лагере записям, он последовательно столкнул в пропасть всех своих спутников и навеки замер у края в ожидании вестей. Принадлежащие техножрецу сервочерепа до последнего охраняли своего впавшего в смертельный транс хозяина, но не смогли спасти его от обезвоживания.

The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

languages.text: Die Auguren des Schiffs haben eine Explorator-Basis mitten im Dschungel geortet. Enforcers haben den Bereich erkundet und berichten, dass das Lager völlig verlassen ist und der einzige verbliebene Techpriester tot am Rand eines seltsamen Abgrunds liegt, der die Planetenoberfläche aufgebrochen hat. Laut den im Lager gefundenen Unterlagen hat er alle seine Gefährten nacheinander in den Abgrund geworfen. Danach stand er bewegungslos am Rand und wartete auf eine Botschaft. Diese tödliche Trance des Techpriesters wurde von seinen Servoschädeln bis zum Ende beobachtet, aber sie konnten ihren Meister nicht vor Dehydrierung bewahren.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

languages.text: Les augures du vaisseau ont détecté une base d'Explorators au beau milieu de la jungle. Selon les prévôts envoyés en reconnaissance, le campement était totalement désert. Le seul technoprêtre qu'ils ont croisé était mort au bord d'une étrange faille ayant fendu la surface de la planète. À en croire les notes trouvées sur place, le technoprêtre aurait poussé ses camarades dans l'abysse les uns après les autres. Il serait resté sans bouger au bord du gouffre, à attendre des nouvelles. Alors que le technoprêtre plongeait dans une transe fatale, ses servocrânes veillèrent sur leur maître jusqu'à sa mort, incapables de le sauver de la déshydratation.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

Le seul technoprêtre qu'ils ont croisé était mort au bord d'une étrange faille ayant fendu la surface de la planète. À en croire les notes trouvées sur place, le technoprêtre aurait poussé ses camarades dans l'abysse les uns après les autres. Il serait resté sans bouger au bord du gouffre, à attendre des nouvelles. languages.text: 舰船的俄歇矩阵在丛林中发现了一座开拓者的营地。前往侦查该地区的执法者已经回来了，他们报告说，这座营地已经被完全废弃了。他们遇到的唯一一位技术神甫已经死在了某个古怪深渊的边缘，这条深渊将整颗行星表面一分为二。从留在营地里的日志来看，就是他亲手将他的同伴一个接一个推入了深渊之中，而他也在悬崖边一动不动，等待着来自深渊的音讯。当他陷入临死前的恍惚状态时，他的伺服头骨一直守护着他，但却无法将他从脱水状态拯救出来，直到最后一刻为止。
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

traits.locale_text: 舰船的俄歇矩阵在丛林中发现了一座开拓者的营地。前往侦查该地区的执法者已经回来了，他们报告说，这座营地已经被完全废弃了。他们遇到的唯一一位技术神甫已经死在了某个古怪深渊的边缘，这条深渊将整颗行星表面一分为二。从留在营地里的日志来看，就是他亲手将他的同伴一个接一个推入了深渊之中，而他也在悬崖边一动不动，等待着来自深渊的音讯。当他陷入临死前的恍惚状态时，他的伺服头骨一直守护着他，但却无法将他从脱水状态拯救出来，直到最后一刻为止。

languages.text: Los augures de la nave han detectado una base exploradora en mitad de la jungla. Los guardias enviados a reconocer la zona han vuelto e informan de que el campamento está totalmente desierto: el único tecnosacerdote que han encontrado estaba muerto al borde de un extraño abismo que divide la superficie del planeta. A juzgar por las notas encontradas en el campamento, empujó a todos sus compañeros a su interior, uno tras otro, y permaneció inmóvil frente al abismo a la espera de noticias. Cuando el tecnosacerdote cayó en un trance letal, sus servocráneos le protegieron hasta el final, pero no pudieron hacer nada por salvar a su amo de la deshidratación.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

Los guardias enviados a reconocer la zona han vuelto e informan de que el campamento está totalmente desierto: el único tecnosacerdote que han encontrado estaba muerto al borde de un extraño abismo que divide la superficie del planeta. A juzgar por las notas encontradas en el campamento, empujó a todos sus compañeros a su interior, uno tras otro, y permaneció inmóvil frente al abismo a la espera de noticias. Cuando el tecnosacerdote cayó en un trance letal, sus servocráneos le protegieron hasta el final, pero no pudieron hacer nada por salvar a su amo de la deshidratación.

languages.text: 船のオーガーがジャングルの中央に設置された探索基地を検出した。偵察に派遣された執行官たちが戻り、キャンプは完全に無人で、彼らが遭遇した唯一の技術司祭は、惑星の表面を分裂させた奇妙な深淵の縁で死んでいるのが発見されたと報告している。キャンプに残されていたメモから判断すると、彼は仲間全員を次々と深淵へと突き落とし、知らせを待ちながら縁で永遠に動かずにいたようだ。技術司祭が死の昏睡状態に陥ったとき、彼のサーヴォスカルは最後まで彼のことを守っていたようだが、主人を脱水症状から救うことはできなかった。
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.

languages.text: Gemideki alametler, ormanın ortasına kurulmuş bir Keşiftör üssü tespit etti. Bölgeyi keşfe gönderilen İnfazcılar geri döndü ve kampın tamamen terk edildiğini, karşılaştıkları tek Tekno Rahip'in de gezegenin yüzeyini ikiye bölen garip bir uçurumun kenarında ölü bulunduğunu bildirdi. Kampta bırakılan notlardan edinilen bilgilere göre bu Tekno Rahip, tüm yoldaşlarını birer birer o uçuruma itmiş ve ardından da uçurumun kenarında sonsuza dek hareketsiz bir şekilde havadis beklemişti. Hizmeletleri, ölümcül bir transa kapılan Tekno Rahip'i son ana dek korusalar da onu susuzluktan kurtaramamışlardı.
languages.original_text: The ship's augurs have detected an Explorator base set up in the middle of the jungle. Enforcers sent to scout the area have returned and are reporting that the camp is completely deserted, and the only Tech-Priest they encountered was found dead on the edge of a strange abyss that had split the planet's surface. Judging by the notes left behind at the camp, he had pushed all his companions into the abyss, one after another, and remained forever motionless at the brink, waiting for tidings. As the Tech-Priest fell into a deathly trance, his servo-skulls guarded him until the end, but could not save their master from dehydration.
